roleset.name: to accelerate
roleset.note: EXPEDITE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'expedite' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from expedite.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yesterday 's vote on Japanese-American reparations ensures final enactment of the entitlement provision , which [*T*-1]-2 abandons earlier efforts [*]to find offsetting cuts but is seen [*-2]-1 as a more realistic path to [*] -1 expediting compensation first authorized [*] in 1988 .
